import React from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../StyleSheets/AboutPageStyle.css'; export default function AboutSections() { return (
What are food allergies?

An immune system reaction soon after eating a trigger food. Even a tiny amount of of the allergen can cause signs and symptoms such as digestive problems, hive, swollen airways, or overall inflammation.

Why I created this site

Having food allergies and a restricted diet, I find myself and a few of my friends with food-allergens having more difficulty finding recipes and more worries going out to eat.
In the age of Google, we are so fortunate to have more resources at our disposal! But most often, recipe sites contain all recipes and MAY mention alternatives for common ingredient allergies. With my love for cooking, I wanted to save some extra time

) }
